name: Unidentified Cheating Object
description:
A fun skill game where you play as a UFO and have to abduct cows and complete objectives. 

Made in a week for the Major Jam: 4

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

Hold in space to abduct cows.

Throw bombs by dragging them in the direction you want to throw them.

Story:

You've been trapped and forced to abduct cows for an evil farmer. But, luckily, someone else who was also trapped by the farmer found out about a cheat code and will tell you if you do some tasks for him.
